lead_paragraph: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne is facing a potentially lengthy spell on the sidelines after he was carried off on a stretcher with a suspected knee ligament injury in Wednesday's League Cup semi-final win over Everton.

headline.print_headline: City's De Bruyne Suffers Suspected Knee Ligament Injury
headline.main: City's De Bruyne Suffers Suspected Knee Ligament Injury

snippet: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne is facing a potentially lengthy spell on the sidelines after he was carried off on a stretcher with a suspected knee ligament injury in Wednesday's League Cup semi-final win over Everton....
